title: Add a shareable short URL path containing “mujhe to tu psnd hai”

requirements.text: Add support for a shareable URL variant that includes the exact phrase “mujhe to tu psnd hai” in the URL (as a URL-safe slug), so the Valentine page renders correctly when opened via that URL.

quotes: Shorter url with 'mujhe to tu psnd hai 'in it

acceptanceCriteria: A URL-safe slug is defined that preserves the phrase (e.g., by converting spaces to hyphens) while keeping the phrase recognizable in the URL.
Opening the app at the slug URL renders the same Valentine experience as the default root URL (no blank page, no errors).
The existing root URL continues to work unchanged.

requirements.text: Expose the custom share URL in the UI so the user can copy/share it easily.

quotes: Shorter url with 'mujhe to tu psnd hai 'in it

acceptanceCriteria: The page shows a copyable share link that includes the custom slug with the phrase in it.
Copying the link produces a valid URL that can be pasted into a new tab and loads the Valentine page successfully.
All user-facing UI labels related to sharing/copying are in English.

constraints: Do not use third-party URL shortener services or external APIs.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Providing a shorter domain name than the existing deployed domain (only a path/slug-based URL variant is in scope).
Implementing custom domains or DNS management.
